page.title: 03FARMING IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {FARMING IN WOODHALL SPA} Sophisticated implements are used today.{Autumn}starts with a Reversible Plough to prepare fields for the disc harrows which are drawn by a large caterpillar tractor to level the ground ready for the 6 metre drill to sow winter barley and wheat.The sugar beet harvester takes two rows of beet and puts it in a hydraulic trailer ready for a 20 ton lorry to remove it to the factory.{Spring}starts with the sowing of spring barley,wheat & peas. The 3 row potato planter,which needs 3 persons,sets the potatoes and is drawn by tractor.The beet seeds are drilled by a space drill.{Summer}begins with the potato picker in which potatoes are weighed and bagged ready for market.Ripened corn is cut by a 20 foot combine and taken in trailers to the drier.Straw is for winter feed.
